## Regular expressions master list created from public sources.
############################# WARNING!!!! ####################################
## Do not edit this file, use CustomRegexes.txt for your own regexes instead
## or else your changes will be lost.
##############################################################################
## To report false positives, or contribute: https://twitter.com/EKFiddle
## Last updated: 2018-03-07

URI	Bloodlust Drive-by	\/bp\/(index\.php\?[\w-]+=[a-zA-Z0-9]+[_-]{1,2}|f\.php$|odt\.dat$)	https://twitter.com/jeromesegura/status/959127241941663744
URI	Chthonic C2	pationare\.bit\/	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2016/12/27/index.html
URI	Coinhive	coin-?hive|\/lib\/cryptonight-asmjs\.min\.js|\/lib\/worker\.wasm|minr\.pw	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
URI	Crypto-loot	coin-?hive|crypto-loot\.com|\/lib\/cryptonight-asmjs\.min\.js|\/lib\/worker\.wasm|minr\.pw
URI	Disdain EK	\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{24}\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{12}\.(php(\?ids=[a-zA-Z0-9]{8})?|swf)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/11/disdain-exploit-kit-served-side-social-engineering/
URI	Fobos Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w{3,6}\/\?[a-z]{3}=[0-9]{10,12}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	Formbook Stealer	\/\?[a-zA-Z]{2,3}=[\w+/]{60,120}==&[a-z][A-Z]{2}[a-z]=[a-zA-Z0-9]{10,15}$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2018/01/15/index.html
URI	GrandSoft EK	\.xyz\/(fmovie\/play.swf|[0-9]\/[0-9]{4})$	https://twitter.com/kafeine/status/958298409944920064
URI	HookAds	\.(info|biz)\/banners\/(advertising|uaps)$	https://malwarebreakdown.com/2018/03/07/hookads-campaign-is-back-and-using-rig-ek-to-deliver-bunitu-proxy-trojan/
URI	KaiXin	\/([A-Z][a-z]){3}\.jar$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
URI	Magnitude EK	^http(s|):\/\/(?![a-z]+\.)([a-z0-9]+\.){2}(?!com)[a-z]{2,7}\/([0-9]{18,19}&[0-9]{7}|[a-z0-9]{32}(\.bmp)?)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
URI	Etags/Coins LTD	\.(com|top|xyz)\/([a-z]{3}\/flap|logs\/[a-z]{3}|[a-z]{3}\/api(\d|)\/\w+)$	https://twitter.com/MrHazum/status/970580777460256769
URI	Ngay Campaign	\/([a-zA-Z0-9]{6}\?source=([0-9]{16}&external_id=\[CPA\]|[0-9]{8}&creative_id=)|gateway\.php\?frm=dm&token=eyJ|\?_subid=[0-9a-z]{16,20}&_token=uuid_[0-9a-z]{16,20}_)	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	Ngay CoinMiner_C2	ngay[0-9]{2,4}\.ru\/buon	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	RIG EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MNO]\w{6,7}(=|)&(\-|\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/08/01/index.html
URI	Rulan Campaign	\.ru\/[a-z]{3}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	Seamless Pre-gate	^https?:\/\/redirect\.distan-kenques\.com\/redirect\?target=BASE64[\w&=_-]+&rm=D	https://traffic.moe/2018/01/25/index.html
URI	Seamless Gate	^https?:\/\/(xn--[\w\.-]+|[a-z0-9]+\.info)\/gav[0-9]\.php	https://umbrella.cisco.com/blog/2017/03/29/seamless-campaign-delivers-ramnit-via-rig-ek/
URI	Punycode(IDN)	^https?:\/\/xn--[\w\.-]+\/
URI	Terror EK	(\/\w+\.gif\?\w+=[0-9]{10}|(\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}){2}\/[a-z]{4}\.[a-z]{3}|\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}\/[a-z]{4}-[a-z-]{5,7}\.[a-z]{3})$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/10/17/index.html
URI	TSS redirection	\.tk\/index\/\?[0-9]{13}$
URI	TSS Landing	\/((\?number=|(AT-|)TollFree(-|))((1-)?8[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}|([0-9]{2}-){4}[0-9]{2}&)|\?a=[0-9]{4}&source=[0-9]{5}_[0-9]{5})$
SourceCode	BlackTDS	document\.write\('\\<script type=\\'text\/javascript\\'\\>location = \\'http:\/\/(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)){3}\/	https://twitter.com/nao_sec/status/970689970552815616
SourceCode	Drive-by Mining	\/lib\/(coinhive|miner).min.js	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
SourceCode	Fobos Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w{3,6}\/\?[a-z]{3}=[0-9]{10,12}
SourceCode	EITest FakeFont	<\/a><div id="upe0" onclick="eu0\(\)" >	https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-insight/post/EITest-Nabbing-Chrome-Users-Chrome-Font-Social-Engineering-Scheme
SourceCode	EITest TSS	function checkTarget\(a\)\{if\(!getCookie\("popundr"\)\)
SourceCode	GrandSoft EK	(document\.write\("<iframe src='"\+srcOfScript\+"'><\/iframe>"\);<\/script>|trifix = zerofix & zerofix & zerofix)	https://twitter.com/kafeine/status/958298409944920064
SourceCode	HookAds	is_bot\|\w+\|[0-9]{2}\|Debian\|Server\|\|else
SourceCode	KaiXin	(\-1,){10}	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
SourceCode	Magniber Ransom	<tr height="38"><td width="30%" style="font-size: 20px;font-family:sans-serif;text-align:left;">MY DECRYPTOR
SourceCode	GanCrab Ransom	class="fa fa-key"><\/i> Buy GandCrab Decryptor<\/a><\/li>
SourceCode	Magnigate	<html>(<head>|<body><iframe><\/iframe>)<script type="text\/javascript" src="data:text\/javascript;base64,dmFy	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
SourceCode	Etags/Coins LTD	\.(com|top|xyz)\/([a-z]{3}\/flap|logs\/[a-z]{3}|[a-z]{3}\/api(\d|)\/\w+)
SourceCode	Seamless Pre-gate	append\("body"\).html\("<div style=\\"\\"><\/div>"\);window.location.href = "http:\/\/treculty-porditely
SourceCode	Seamless Gate	\t<iframe width="500" scrolling="no" height="500" frameborder="500" src="http:\/\/(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)){3}\/
SourceCode	Redirection RIG EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MN]\w{7}&(\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}
SourceCode	TSS audio	(beep|alert|warning|Texts)[0-9]?\.mp3" type="audio
SourceCode	TSS TFN	(\+1)?(-[0-9]{3}){2}-[0-9]{4}(\\n){30}
SourceCode	TSS redirection	function createCookie13123213\(e,o,r\)
